text: [Music]
how to play office politics just staying
out of it could stunt your career here's
how to jump in and get ahead without
getting burned you will need observation
skills goals allies social skills and
tact step one observe how your workplace
functions pay attention to the company's
core values and how they most
effectively get put into action also
find out who is influential and take
note of what respond to step two set
objectives with your boss that
contribute to the company's goals and
develop your value as an employee inform
your boss when you meet certain
benchmarks to create a track record of
goal oriented success step three get the
support of co-workers by reciprocating
favors in offering your expertise on
projects only accept a manageable
workload in the long run co-workers will
respect you more if they know you have
the power to say no step four build a
network that incorporates several
different groups and departments
aligning yourself too strongly with one
could leave you out in the cold if they
fall out of favor step five sidestep
gossip the target of Gossip one day
could be a decision maker the next if
you find yourself in the middle of a
nasty exchange excuse yourself or Focus
the conversation on the people talking
not the person being talked about step
six brag just make sure to do it
tactfully and always give your
co-workers credit for shared
accomplishments telling people about
your accomplishments in increases the
chances your boss will learn of your
successes from someone other than you
which works in your favor when they're
deciding who gets a promotion and who
gets the a did you know in a recent
survey more than half of employees said
the competitive level of office politics
had increased over the previous 5 years
[Music]
